title: Principles of radio. Part 2. Receiving radio messages
brief_description: The general principles of the radio receiver are explained, and the following points treated in detail: the problem of tuning; the capacity of a variable condenser; the inductance of a coil; resonance; detection, and how a crystal is used as a detector; the operation of an earphone; the production of audible sound waves.
